segments.advisor_message: Alright, so before we wrap this up, can you share wh-what your current state of health is?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, my health is like, um, okay I guess, nothing serious, just some, like, little stuff, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Got it. Any specifics or, like, explanations you wanna give regarding that?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I mean, I-I don’t smoke but, uh, I've been thinking about it cause, um, a lot of stress and, uh, I... I mostly don’t, though, heh.

segments.advisor_message: That's good to hear! And, uh, just to finish up, do you have a will or like, any power of attorney in place?
segments.client_message: Uh, well, I do have a will, I think? It’s old though and I really need to check it, but, um, no power of attorney or any of that stuff right now, I guess.
